description: Surrogate key uniquely identifying this estimated resource record for a work order asset procedure.
Foreign key referencing the specific work orderâ€“asset procedure (task/step) this resource estimate belongs to.
Flag indicating whether this estimated resource line has been completed or closed.
Code identifying the required craft/trade for this resource; likely references a craft master record; confirm with SME.
Identifier of the resource estimated or assigned to perform the procedure (person, crew, or equipment); likely references a resource master; confirm with SME.
Sequence number of the resource line within the procedure or work order.
Planned labor or resource hours for this line.
Unfinished hours still expected to complete this resource line.
Planned date/time to perform this resource work on the work order procedure.
System timestamp of the most recent change to this record (any source, user or integration).
Timestamp recorded when a user last edited this record; may differ from system last_modified; confirm with SME.
Identifier of the user who created this estimated resource record.
Timestamp when this record was initially created by a user.
Identifier of the user who last modified this record.
Timestamp when a user last modified this record.
